title: Watermelon Crew x2 Looking for more players Diam+.
body:
Hello,

Due to the very good response from the community, i will be creating a second watermelon crew team, our first team is doing great with 3 challengers already playing and smashing!, atm i have too many players for one team so the idea is creating a secondary team and not leaving anyone behind!!

We are always keen to welcome nice, friendly, social and active good players to our social group. For now is all about having fun and play ranked games, in a future if we work hard as a community we could be thinking in join the OCS. Who knows whats going to happen! 

Come and join us in this journey! Reply this post or add me IGN Dr Watermelon

replies.body: Hey, I would like to join you guys to improve together.
Just popping in to wish you luck and I enjoy your team name !

Been playing league since season 1, im diamond happy to join
IGN: Poppy God
Thanks for your message, i will add you ingame :)

I would love to join in! Sounds like a lot of fun :D
IGN: Kitty Katt
